uncategorized.description: Posts that do not strictly fit in with any existing categories
handle.description: This category can be followed from the open social web via the handle %1
no-topics:
There are no posts in this category.
Why don't you try posting one?
no-followers: Nobody on this website is tracking or watching this category. Track or watch this category in order to begin receiving updates.
watching.description:
Notify me of new posts.
Show posts in unread & recent
not-watching.description: Do not show posts in unread, show in recent
ignoring.description: Do not show posts in unread & recent
watching.message: You are now watching updates from this category and all subcategories
tracking.message: You are now tracking updates from this category and all subcategories
notwatching.message: You are not watching updates from this category and all subcategories
ignoring.message: You are now ignoring updates from this category and all subcategories
